title: Hurts album
content:
Looking for the 'Exile' font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341im_/http:/typophile.com/files/del_6263.png)

Another one, same font (they have short song names unfortunately)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341im_/http:/typophile.com/files/del1_4350.jpg)

Font: 

 Helvetica Neue (Thin) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [del.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341/http:/typophile.com/files/del_0.png) | 408.7 KB |
author: Claiiiresss

comments.content:
Looks like a customized (artificially contrasted) [Goudy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/goudy) to me...  
Alternative, different design: [Throhand Pen](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/throhand-pen)
I think you thought about the title not 'Exile' :)

Not easy to be sure with just a few letters, but I think **[Helvetica Neue (Thin)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125341/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Helvetica%20Neue%20-%20Thin&fid=c5a5cbf4dbcaa7064f2bc77f52101aec&fsize=60&text=E%20X%20I%20L%20E&fit=1)** is a fine match ;)

> I think you thought about the title not 'Exile' :)

Damn right! Another of my zealous answer, sorry for that :). Actually, 'EXILE' sub-headline looked so poorly attractive or "easy" to identify to me, I didn't even consider it :D Anyway, that's probably easy but I can't concur more with Fivos, should be Helvetica Neue (Thin).
